page.title: 15PLOODY HOUSE CONT
page.content: PLODDY HOUSE (CONT FROM PAGE 14) The farm has 4 full-time workers and 1 student. They all live locally in the Newent area and either walk to work or travel by car or motorbike. Some of his workers have been fairly recently appointed to work on the farm, only 2 months ago, whereas his longest serving employee has worked on the farm for 14 years. Some of his men are craftsmen and some do un-skilled jobs. The work they have to do involves working a wide range of agricultural machinery such as tractors, potato harvesters, sugar-beet harvesters, drills, planters, harrows and spreaders. They also have to do routine maintenance on the machines, but get an agricultural engineer in for the more complicated repairs. The workers generally work a 40 hour week, but if busy will do overtime.
